channel.title: #BlueFlame by Bryanston High
channel.managingEditor: blue-flame@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Bryanston High School | Solid Gold Podcasts)
channel.copyright: © Bryanston High School - all rights reserved
channel.description:
MISSION STATEMENT Bryanston High School strives to provide quality education within a caring environment that balances the pursuit of academic excellence and the development of life skills, so as to empower all of the learners to achieve their potential and meet the challenges of a dynamic society as responsible citizens.

VISION It is the school's vision that each matriculant leaving Bryanston High School will leave with a sound academic foundation, will have participated actively in various spheres of the school, will have learnt morals, respect and represent all that is noble and good within the community of Bryanston. Each matriculant will wear their uniform with pride and upon leaving the school their achievements will enable us to wish them well for their bright futures.

VALUES Honesty, integrity and tolerance; Respect for self, others and the environment; Faith and spirituality; Courtesy and manners; Commitment and responsibility

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: News and updates from the Top School in the Johannesburg northern suburbs
channel.itunes:author: Bryanston High School | Solid Gold Podcasts

item.title: Grade 10s and 11s return to school | John Skelton (Principal) Bev Weir (Senior Deputy) Gia Marais (English Teacher)
item.itunes:title: Grade 10s and 11s return to school | John Skelton (Principal) Bev Weir (Senior Deputy) Gia Marais (English Teacher)
item.itunes:subtitle: First day back for our Gr 10 and 11 pupils
item.description:
Grade 10s and 11s return to school — First day back for our Gr 10 and 11 pupils John Skelton (Principal) Bev Weir (Senior Deputy) Gia Marais (English Teacher) Today Principal John Skelton discusses the safe return of the Grade 10 and 11 pupils, the plan to finish the curriculum and some general advice for the Bryanston family.

Music : https://JohnBartmann.com


Visit the school's website https://www.bryanston.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:subtitle: Grade 12's are back to school on Monday
item.description:
Matrics — we'll see you on Monday 1 June — Grade 12's are back to school on Monday As the Minister of Education delays her update, Bryanston High School continues with its plans to open safely for Grade 12s on Monday 1 June.


Visit the school's website https://www.bryanston.com/

item.title: Welcome to Grade 8 | Phuti Mogale, Patrick Slatter and Carryn Davidson
item.itunes:title: Welcome to Grade 8 | Phuti Mogale, Patrick Slatter and Carryn Davidson
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the #TrueBlue family
item.description:
It's time for High School and we're providing a few reminders before you (and your child) before school starts in January.


Mail Grade Controller Phuti Mogale phutimogale@bryanston.com

Mail Grade Controller Patrick Slatter patrickslatter@bryanston.com

Mail Mrs Corlett in accounts. NB! Use your child's Student Number for ALL EFTs. juneCorlett@bryanston.com

Music Used : Earning Happiness | https://johnbartmann.com/music/


Visit the school's website https://www.bryanston.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.title: White Blazers, Hockey Astro, and an Awesome Team! | John Skelton, Nadia Karczmarczyk, Storm Ripley-Evans, Andy Crighton
item.itunes:title: White Blazers, Hockey Astro, and an Awesome Team! | John Skelton, Nadia Karczmarczyk, Storm Ripley-Evans, Andy Crighton
item.itunes:subtitle: Catch up on the Bryanston High School news, directly from the Headmaster
item.description:
In our first ever #BlueFlame podcast newsletter, Headmaster John Skelton talks to some of his School Management Team (SMT) about one of the highlights of his year (White Blazer Assembly), the new Hockey Astro, new staff, and preparing for exams.

Music Used : Earning Happiness | https://johnbartmann.com/music/


Visit the school's website https://www.bryanston.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
